data.lyric:
[ti:Bad Luck]
[ar:Khalid]
[al:Free Spirit]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]Bad Luck - Khalid
[00:02.62]Lyrics by：Khalid Robinson/Mike Riley/Kurtis McKenzie/Al Shuckburgh
[00:05.24]Composed by：Khalid Robinson/Mike Riley/Kurtis McKenzie/Al Shuckburgh
[00:07.87]Mmm mmm
[00:13.93]Oh yeah oh yeah yeah
[00:21.49]Alright
[00:23.82]Don't save me I'm in no need of saving oh yeah
[00:29.76]And if you stay with me I know you need patience yeah yeah
[00:36.07]Blood and cologne on the fragrance mmm yeah yeah
[00:41.36]'Cause if ya deal with me I know you know what pain is oh no
[00:47.11]So if you're gonna love me
[00:49.66]You gotta love all of me
[00:52.49]You gotta love deeper than that
[00:58.37]Now if you're gonna leave me
[01:01.22]You better run far away
[01:04.16]I'd hate for you to leave me attached
[01:09.39]'Cause I'm in love with bad luck
[01:12.46]I'm in love with bad luck
[01:15.29]Move too close get caught up
[01:18.05]Move too close get caught up
[01:21.50]I'm in love with bad luck
[01:24.14]I'm in love with bad luck
[01:26.90]Move too close get caught up
[01:30.03]Move too close get caught up
[01:33.31]I'm in love bad luck yeah yeah yeah
[01:41.59]And I don't even like to think about it
[01:44.64]On my own but still so crowded
[01:47.47]Walls come down and the guards come up
[01:50.29]But there's nowhere to run I feel surrounded
[01:53.29]Hurt feels better when I'm by myself
[01:56.15]No one really means it when they're wishing you well
[01:58.95]I got no one to call no one
[02:01.96]And people only love you when they're needing your wealth
[02:07.42]D**n laying down staring at my ceiling fan
[02:10.33]Everybody acting like they give a d**n
[02:13.15]Where is everybody when you need a hand
[02:15.87]I've been burning rubber on the Michelin
[02:18.96]Flying in the rain like I'm Superman
[02:21.77]I could say I love it but that just depends
[02:25.43]'Cause I'm in love with bad luck
[02:28.51]I'm in love with bad luck
[02:31.22]Move too close get caught up
[02:34.22]Move too close get caught up
[02:37.02]I'm in love with bad luck
[02:40.07]I'm in love with bad luck
[02:42.91]Move too close get caught up
[02:45.77]Move too close get caught up
[02:48.55]I'm in love
[02:50.02]So if you're gonna love me
[02:52.55]You gotta love all of me
[02:55.72]You gotta love deeper than that
[03:01.42]Now if you're gonna leave me
[03:04.48]You better run far away
[03:07.27]I'd hate for you to leave me attached
[03:12.29]'Cause I'm in love with bad luck
[03:15.38]I'm in love with bad luck
[03:18.16]Move too close get caught up
[03:20.96]Move too close get caught up
[03:24.27]I'm in love with bad luck
[03:26.91]I'm in love with bad luck
[03:29.77]Move too close get caught up
[03:32.64]Move too close get caught up
[03:35.56]I'm in love with bad luck
[03:39.20]Yeah I'm in love with bad luck
[03:42.92]Bad bad luck
data.trans:
[ti:Bad Luck]
[ar:Khalid]
[al:Free Spirit]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]//
[00:02.62]//
[00:05.24]//
[00:07.87]//
[00:13.93]//
[00:21.49]好的
[00:23.82]不要拯救我 我不需要拯救
[00:29.76]如果你跟我在一起 恐怕得有点耐心
[00:36.07]空气中弥漫着鲜血和古龙香水的味道
[00:41.36]如果你跟我相处 你肯定会明白痛苦的感觉
[00:47.11]所以如果你打算爱我
[00:49.66]你就要爱我的全部
[00:52.49]你必须不顾一切地爱我
[00:58.37]如果你现在打算离开我
[01:01.22]你最好逃得远远的
[01:04.16]我会恨你让我变得如此依恋
[01:09.39]因为我迷恋上了厄运
[01:12.46]我爱上了厄运
[01:15.29]靠得太近 深陷其中
[01:18.05]靠得太近 深陷其中
[01:21.50]我爱上了厄运
[01:24.14]我爱上了厄运
[01:26.90]靠得太近 深陷其中
[01:30.03]靠得太近 深陷其中
[01:33.31]我爱上了厄运
[01:41.59]我不想思考这件事情
[01:44.64]此刻只有我一个人 但依然感觉拥挤不堪
[01:47.47]高墙倾倒 我筑起了防备
[01:50.29]但四面楚歌 我已无处可逃
[01:53.29]当我一个人时 痛苦便减轻了一点
[01:56.15]他们祝你平安的时候 没人是真心的
[01:58.95]我连一个可以打电话的人都没有
[02:01.96]人们爱你的时候 其实爱的是你身后的荣华富贵
[02:07.42]可恶 躺在床上 望着吊扇
[02:10.33]每个人都装作很在乎你
[02:13.15]当你需要帮助的时候 都突然失踪
[02:15.87]我一直在狂奔
[02:18.96]像超人一样在雨中飞翔
[02:21.77]我可以说我喜欢这样 但还是要看情况
[02:25.43]因为我迷恋上了厄运
[02:28.51]我爱上了厄运
[02:31.22]靠得太近 深陷其中
[02:34.22]靠得太近 深陷其中
[02:37.02]我爱上了厄运
[02:40.07]我爱上了厄运
[02:42.91]靠得太近 深陷其中
[02:45.77]靠得太近 深陷其中
[02:48.55]我爱上了
[02:50.02]所以如果你打算爱我
[02:52.55]你就要爱我的全部
[02:55.72]你必须不顾一切地爱我
[03:01.42]如果你现在打算离开我
[03:04.48]你最好逃得远远的
[03:07.27]我会恨你让我变得如此依恋
[03:12.29]因为我迷恋上了厄运
[03:15.38]我爱上了厄运
[03:18.16]靠得太近 深陷其中
